X-JSON-RPC-URL.name: X-JSON-RPC-URL
X-JSON-RPC-URL.description: Override default JSON RPC URL used for querying the blockchain

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: Groups all endpoints related to account information, such as retrieving account balances, nonces, and other account address-specific data.

tags.name: Blocks
tags.description: Encompasses all endpoints related to querying block information on the Koinos blockchain. At time of writing, only used for retrieving block details.

tags.name: Chain
tags.description: Groups endpoints that provide information about the blockchain's current state, such as chain ID, block head info, fork heads, and resource limits.

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: Includes endpoints for interacting with smart contracts deployed on the Koinos blockchain, covering contract ABI, reading the contract depending on the method, etc.

tags.name: Decode
tags.description: Endpoints under the 'Decode' tag are used for decoding encoded blockchain data, such as transactions and event logs, making them human-readable and easier to interpret.

tags.name: Fungible Tokens
tags.description: Groups endpoints that deal with fungible token operations, including querying token balances, total supply, general information, etc.

tags.name: Koinos Account Protocol
tags.description: Endpoints under the 'Koinos Account Protocol' tag focus on name services within the Koinos network, including retrieving account addresses from names and vice versa.

tags.name: Koindx
tags.description: Dedicated to endpoints related to a Koinos decentralized exchange features, covering token pair information, quotes for token swaps, and market data.

tags.name: Non Fungible Tokens
tags.description: Encompasses all endpoints related to Non Fungible Tokens on the Koinos blockchain, including querying an account's NFT balance, total supply, NFT's uri, etc.

tags.name: Nicknames
tags.description: Endpoints under this tag focus on the nickname services within the Koinos blockchain, including querying the nicknames owned by an account and the account associated with a particular nickname.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Groups endpoints handling transaction-related operations, including querying transaction details, preparing a transaction, and submitting it.
